title: I just bought Xerath twice using RP
body: I just bought Xerath twice using RP. WTF? HOw can I refund the other Xerath I bought? After I bought Xerath there was an Error occur so I logout my lol account and after I came back my Riot Points just decrease twice as Xerath's price and I look at my Purchase History I just purchase Xerath Twice. WTF!! Please Notice this message and help me refund my RP.~~~~

replies.body:
You'll need to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this and work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
